title: EOL and EOS Product
description: A standard schema for representing End-of-Life (EOL) and End-of-Support (EOS) product information

supplierId.description: The unique identifier for the supplier

productVersion.description: The version or release of the product

EOLNotificationDate.description: The date on which the end of life notification is issued

EOSDate.description: The date after which the product is no longer offered for sale

LDOSDate.description: The last date to receive support as entitled by active service contracts

replacementProduct.description: Information about the recommended replacement product, if applicable

productId.description: The unique product identifier of the replacement product

productName.description: The name of the replacement product

productVersion.description: The version or release of the replacement product
